title: Footstep1 SoundEffect
longDescription:
🎧️YoutubePreview


📖Overview.

The Footstep Sound Effects Pack is a comprehensive collection of footstep-related sound effects suitable for use in games, films, animation projects, and various other applications. This pack includes a wide variety of surface types, such as BoardWalk, Cardboard, Carpet, Wood, Concrete, Dirt, Forest, Grass, Gravel, Metal, Plastic, Sand, Stone, TreeTrunk, and more. The sound effects are provided in both stereo and mono formats, making them versatile for use in UI effects, in-game positional audio, and more.



🕹️Functionality.

  • Diverse Footstep Sounds: This pack comprises a range of footstep-related sound effects on various surfaces, suitable for different environments and scenarios.
  • Stereo and Mono Files: The sound effects are provided in both stereo and mono formats, enabling their use for various purposes, including UI effects and in-game positional audio.
  • Versatile Use: These sound effects can enhance footstep-related scenarios in a variety of projects, including games, films, and animations.



📂FILES. (TrackList)

  • Board_Walk 14
  • Cardboard_Pile 20
  • Carpet_Over_Wood 12
  • Concrete 40
  • Dirt 20
  • Forest 17
  • Grass 20
  • Gravel 42
  • Metal 10
  • Plastic_Carrier_Bag 15
  • Sand 30
  • Sand_Wet 15
  • Stone 14
  • Stoney 20
  • Tree_Trunk 12
  • Wood 101


⭐5STAR Review.

  • If you like the product, please leave a 5-star review! We always have a great communication with our customers. :D
  • Even if you don't have the sound you want, please leave a 5-star review and feedback! We will check the customer's review every two weeks and fill in the sound as possible every two weeks! We will also give you a relevant reply if your opinion is reflected :D


♬CopyrightFreeMusic Playlist

We provide copyright-free music (CC0) content that can be used in various fields such as games, movies, animations, YouTube, etc., to ensure the success of your projects. Please check out our YouTube channel playlist through the link below! All the music tracks have been composed and produced by us directly. Therefore, we can guarantee that they are very safe from copyright issues.


  • Youtube Playlist
  • Reselling and using for AI training purposes are explicitly prohibited. It must be used as part of personal and corporate projects only.
technicalDetails:
TECHNICAL INFORMATION.

  • Number of Audio Wavs: 804 (402 Mono and 402 Stereo)
  • Number of Audio Cues: 804 (402 Mono and 402 Stereo)
  • Sample rate : 44.1kHz (Standard)
  • Bit Rate : 320Kbps (Standard)
  • Bit Depth : 24bit Depth (Standard)
  • Do Sound FX loop: No
  • Minutes of audio provided: 03:36
  • Supported Development Platforms: All
  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes


LOUDNESS.

  • Average Short Term : -10LUFS ~
  • Average Long Trem : -12LUFS ~
  • Average Range : 12LU ~
  • Average Momentary : -8LUFS ~
  • Average Trim : 3.0~
  • TruePeak : 0dBTP
  • The loudness values (Short Term, Long Term, Range, Momentary, TruePeak, etc.) may vary depending on the theme, timbre, and character of sound effects.


SOUND EFFECT CREATION METHODS.

How to Create: This product has been produced in a professional studio.

Mixing & Mastering : Yes, This product has been mastered in a professional studio.
